articles.title: Kim Jong Il Registered as Honorary Special Member of NJA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Registered as Honorary Special Member of NJA 
    Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was registered as an honorary special member of the Nepal Journalist Association (NJA) on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the 12th anniversary of his election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
 A ceremony was held in Katmandu on March 30 to convey the beautifully decorated certificate of the honorary special member of the NJA to be presented to Kim Jong Il.
 At the ceremony Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the NJA, conveyed it to the DPRK ambassador to Nepal.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised as Greatest Leader
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised as Greatest Leader 
    Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung is the greatest leader recognized by the revolutionary people of the world, said Fayez Ismail,
general secretary of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria, on March 29 in a statement released on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
 He said that Kim Il Sung achieved the historic cause of liberating the country and turned the DPRK into a modern socialist powerful country and actively supported the progressive people of the world in their anti-imperialist revolutionary cause.    
 Noting that thanks to leader Kim Jong Il who has inherited the idea and virtue of the President, the revolutionary cause of Juche has made continued victories despite the upheavals of the present complicated international situation, the general secretary expressed firm conviction that the friendly Korean people would achieve final victory as they hold the great leader in high esteem and are guided by his great idea.

Kim Yong Nam Meets Egyptian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Egyptian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with Ahmed Ramy, Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on April 4.
 On hand were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and members of the Egyptian embassy here.
